sanskrit_verse:
यदन्यगोषु वृषभो वत्सानां जनयेत्शतम् ।
गोमिनामेव ते वत्सा मोघं स्कन्दितमार्षभम् ॥ ९.५०॥
transliteration: yadanyagoṣu vṛṣabho vatsānāṃ janayetśatam | gomināmeva te vatsā moghaṃ skanditamārṣabham || 9.50 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: When a bull not owned by a cowherd generates a hundred calves among others' cows, those calves belong exclusively to the true owners of the cows; the wandering bull has gained nothing thereby.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority derives from rightful ownership and custodianship
Causation is recognized in direct lineage and generative action
Capacity-based responsibility aligns with existential role and dharma
Restoration logic returns outcome to its originating source
Consciousness alignment ensures recognition of what is inherently owned
executable_legal_axioms: IF an agent acts upon property without ownership THEN generated value reverts to legitimate owner
IF generative capacity is exercised outside lawful domain THEN no entitlement accrues to the generator
IF biological or causal output originates from another's resource THEN product belongs to that resource's lawful holder
RESTORE rightful ownership automatically upon detection of misaligned causation
supreme_court_application: In matters involving unauthorized use of assets resulting in progeny or yield, this verse establishes that original ownership remains unchanged regardless of intermediary involvement. The court must recognize inherent proprietorship over derivative outcomes without recourse to punitive measures against the intermediary actor.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa confirms that causality flows from the cow-owner’s right to their livestock's reproductive potential. Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals that offspring emerge through lawful lineage, unaffected by transient influence. Responsibility lies in alignment with one's dharma, not in blame. No suffering arises; only clarity restores truth.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Automatically transfer ownership records of calves to original cow-owners
Realign generative agent (bull) with appropriate custodial domain
Ensure all parties acknowledge factual causality without attribution of fault
Implement consciousness-based registry confirming dharmic alignment of stewardship
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source of Law. Ownership reverts to origin. Dharma is restored. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates.
